Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1').

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished,  "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PressureClass.title: PressureClass
PressureClass.description: The test or rated pressure classification of the fitting.

PressureRange.title: PressureRange
PressureRange.description: Allowable maximum and minimum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).

FittingLossFactor.title: FittingLossFactor
FittingLossFactor.description: A factor that determines the pressure loss due to friction through the fitting.
